name: Spice of Life
description:
In this game, your harvest spices to create curry mixes. Things aren't so easy, though -- to get water for your fields, you need to appeal to four gargoyles who will water each of your fields when you grant them an offering of curry! 

A Nordic Game Jam 2023 game based on the prompts curry, gargoyle and bewilderment.

Designed by Mikkel Bruun Ibsen & Sejr Thomsen

Art by Sejr Thomsen

Programming by Mikkel Bruun Ibsen
